features: 【Great Montessori Stacking Toys】The Montessori toys for toddlers set includes 30PCS stacking blocks of 5 various bright colors, shapes and sizes. Toddlers age 1-3 can create more than 60 kinds of designs by referring to the guiding manual, and toddlers age 3-5 can create their own designs with their rich imagination. Kids’ logic thinking skills can be better improved.

【Valuable STEM Educational Toys】The Montessori toys for 2 year old are designed as learning toys to help your kids’ to develop their fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, hand-eye coordination, color recognition, and also arouse their creativity and imagination. Great toddler learning toys and preschool learning activities.

【Blocks for Toddlers 1-3 with Storage Bag】With a blue non-woven bag, our montessori toys for 3 year old can be stored and taken out easily. Kids can establish the good habit of storing toys after playing. Also the stacking blocks can be taken to anywhere (school/party/trip) by using the bag. Super portable travel toys.

【Sensory Toys for Toddlers 1-3】Bright colors and different shapes of building blocks toys are perfect for your kids to build early and basic cognition of color and space geometry. Making various combinations with our STEM toys also can attract kids attention and keep them busy. Awesome toddler toys age 2-4.

【Ideal gifts for Boys Girls】Our toddler blocks are made of non-toxic plastic material, durable and safe for kids, BPA free. Lightweight and its suitable sizes are easy for small hands to grab and play, non-sharped edge, perfect gifts for 2 year old girls, toddler toys age 1-2, learning toys for toddlers 1-3, stem toys for 2 year old boy.
body.description: 【The Content of Montessori Blocks Set】2 X Red Blocks (5”)4 X Blue Blocks (4”)6 X Green Blocks (3”)8 X Yellow Blocks (2”)10 X White Blocks (1.3”)1 X Blue Non-Woven Storage Bag (15.3”x 11.8”)【Recommended Age】Toddlers Kids Boys Girls Ages 1 2 3 4 5 Years Old Baby 12-18 Months【Satisfactory Customer Service】If there are missing parts, damages or any problems when our Montessori toys arrive, please feel free to contact us from your order list, we will take 100% responsibility in 24hrs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler loves to Build
reviews.reviewText: Loves to build. The lightweight building is great for a solid floor, not carpet.Great for solo or group playtime. Great opportunity to learn how to share because there are so many pieces.Challenging at first my toddler needed direction and demonstration but after was easy to pick up and do by himself with or without me.Highly recommend for a toddler nonelectronic gift. It was a hit at playtime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are so fun! 2 year old loves them
reviews.reviewText: We love these! They get played with everyday. They are fun and easy for toddlers to grab, hold, stack. There are so many different creations you can make. Out of all the toys we have, these get played with the most. We like that it comes with a bag for easy cleanup and easy for in the go. They are easy to take along with us. These would make a great gift. We are really happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our favorite blocks
reviews.reviewText: These are so fun to build with. Great quality. More unique and interlocking than traditional blocks. Considering buying another set! The small white pieces are a little small for the 1 year old, but easy enough to put away for now. The 3 year old loves them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and engaging
reviews.reviewText: Would give it 5 stars if it came with a base. Sadly it doesn’t. Great toy though. My nanny kids love to play with it but might need to purchase another set because 1 doesn’t seem to be enough pieces for 2 to play without argument although there are many pieces. They just love building with as many pieces as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This TOY is FANTASTIC!
reviews.reviewText: There is absolutely NOTHING to dislike about this toy! It is FANTASTIC!! Our 1 and 2 year old could easily build PLUS it is fun and challenging for older children and even for adults! A+++++++++++ Also it comes with a nice tote bag!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can not go wrong with this toy.
reviews.reviewText: These blocks are so versatile in stacking that you can not go wrong when placing one on top of the other. My 18 month old grandson tried them today and really enjoyed them. We took turns putting a block on the stack. However, there is a little book inside to show several towers a kid can make on their own and I think that kids even up to age eight would play with this toy. I wouldn't buy it for a child that age, but to have in the house for visiting children it would appeal to a wider range of ages. There is a nice draw string bag to keep them together in the toy box which is a plus! I am not for sure why the rating features suggest "for teething" because it isn't a teething toy. In fact the smaller blocks, I'd remove until I knew the child wouldn't put them in their mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome blocks. The kids were playing with them and the adults too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: My 18 month old loves stacking them together
